long_description: Why take your gloves off to operate your smartphone when you could keep your fingers toasty with the touch-screen compatible Marmot Connect Softshell gloves?. Special material at the tips of the thumbs and index fingers allows you to send text messages and surf the web on your touch-screen phone without having to take the gloves off. Stretchy polyester/elastane blend fends off breezes and cool temps. Grippy pattern on the palms helps you hold onto your smartphone.
